The Future of Humanity: I would want to see the future of humanity and how it will evolve over time. I would want to see how technology will continue to shape our lives and what new advancements we can expect to see in the future.
Personal Growth: I would want to see what personal growth I can expect to see in the future. I would want to see how my skills and abilities will improve and how I can continue to grow as a person.

Relationships: I would want to see how my relationships with family, friends, and romantic partners will evolve over time. I would want to see how we will continue to grow and connect with each other.
Career: I would want to see what my career will look like in the future. I would want to see what new opportunities and challenges I will face and how I can continue to grow and succeed in my career.

The Environment: I would want to see how the environment will evolve over time. I would want to see how we will address climate change and other environmental issues and what new solutions we can expect to see in the future.
